attributes.action: STOP THE PRIVITISATION OF ANY PART OF THE NHS. NO MORE CUTS TO JOBS AND SERVICES.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PUSH People United Saving Hospitals is a national campaign set up by local campaign groups. Our campaign was established to create unity in the fight to stop the destruction of the NHS. We believe that health care should be free at the point of need. We want the stop of all the privitisation and cuts in services and jobs beleaguered NHS contact
